Depends on what you believe.  Is an unelected board in a government who are openly hostile to encryption going to make arbitrary rule decisions and mandates that are somehow helpful?

Please pay the fee and submit your site for content analysis, and we'll refer you to the appropriate agency for further processing, under penalty of jail for non-compliance. 

I'll roll the dice on Evil Corp who will lose market share in regions where they have competition if your p0rn and Netflix are slow.
